3.heading: Egyptian Comic Books, Strips, Etc.--Books About.

3.author: Allan Douglas, Fedwa Malti-Douglas.

publication info.publisher: Centre d'études et de documentation économique, juridique et sociale

notes: Dossier (Markaz al-Dir¯as¯at wa-al-Wath¯a'iq al-Iqtis¯ad¯iyah wa-al-Q¯an¯un¯iyah wa-al-Ijtim¯a`¯iyah (Cairo, Egypt)) ; 1986, no. 4
Political aspects of both Egyptian and French comics, with focus on Ramses II, presidents Nasser and De Gaulle, and Mickey Mouse.

16.heading: Egyptian Mummies.
16.title: "The Sphinx Speaks"
16.author: by Joe Simon and Jack Kirby
16.appears_in: 12 p. in Detective Comics, no. 66 (Aug. 1942) ; reprinted in Boy Commandos, no. 1 (Oct. 1973)
notes: SUMMARY: A reporter in the year 3045 interviews an Egyptian mummy, who tells a story from the past (1942) when German soldiers installed a radio transmitter in the Sphinx.
